content:
British/American
 -our/-or  Unstressed syllables, AmE tends to spell -or instead of -our.
    BrE AmE     armour armor   behaviour behavior   colour color   endeavour endeavor   favour favor   flavour flavor   glamour glamor, glamour   harbour harbor   honour honor   humour humor   labour labor   neighbour neighbor   rigour rigor   rumour rumor   saviour savior, saviour   vigour vigor    -re/-er    BrE AmE     centre center   fibre fiber   litre liter   metre meter   sabre saber   spectre specter   theatre theater    Special cases    BrE AmE     acre acre   cadre cadre   genre genre   lucre lucre   massacre massacre   mediocre mediocre   ogre ogre   timbre timbre    -l/-ll Unstressed syllables    Base BrE AmE     jewel jeweller jeweler   travel traveller, travelled, travelling traveller, traveled, traveling   wool woollen woolen    Stressed syllables    BrE AmE     appal appall   enrol enroll   distil distill   fulfil fulfill   skilful skillful    Special cases    BrE AmE     install install   expel expel   repel repel   until until    -ise/-ize    BrE AmE     apologise apologize    authorize    characterize    emphasize    minimize    organize    recognize    specialize    stabilize    Special cases    BrE AmE      advertise    advise    arise    chastise    exercise    revise    rise    supervise    surprise    televise    -yse/-yze    BrE AmE      analyze    breathalyze    paralyze    ae, oe/e    BrE AmE     paediatrician pediatrician   paedophile pedophile   aesthetic esthetic   encyclopaedia, encyclopedia encyclopedia    Special cases    BrE AmE     paella paella    Others
title: Spelling - BrE & AmE
